router().notice: ADD LIQUIDITY WITH ROUTER EXERCISE  The contract has an initial balance of 1000 USDC and 1 ETH.  Mint a position (deposit liquidity) in the pool USDC/ETH to `msg.sender`.  The challenge is to use Uniswapv2 router to add liquidity to the pool.
